channel.title: Command list interface
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i need some help with Makeing a new command interface.
I have a dspk source (kind of) and i like to make a ::commands command and that you see a empty quest rol full with commands. but how can i make that?. i googled it but i didnt found it. mybe can you help me with makeing one.
Currently if i do ::commands i see the commandlist in the chatbox.. I want the same list in a list like ::players that pop up if you do it.
If you can help me, Please.
If you cant, No prob :)
~zerk

item.title: Command list interface
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

i highly doubt you cannot find this already, but to make life easier ill give you mine

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“newinterface”)) {
c.clearPlayersInterface();
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@SERVERNAME Player Commands", 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8146);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8156);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8157);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8158);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8159);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8160);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8161);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8162);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8163);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8165);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8166);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8167);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8168);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8169);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8170);

            c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
            c.flushOutStream();
                    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
